events.name: HackerNest Singapore June Tech Social
events.description: Drinks on us. That's right: free beer/water  HackerNest Tech Socials are a fun, relaxed way to connect with your local tech brethren. Atmosphere: chill, friendly, unpretentious, agenda-free (no sales pitch, yo), and brimming with UltraSmart(TM) people. We believe that strong, supportive tech communities should exist everywhere - not just in hotspots like San Francisco and New York. In 2011, we started running Tech Socials in Toronto, where our monthly attendance grew to over 350+ technologists literally 100% from word-of-mouth. The typical Tech Social schedule: - 6:00pm: folks arrive, grab drinks, socialize  - 7:00pm: quick intro, thank sponsors - 7:10pm: back to chatting with interesting new friends  - 9:00pm: go home exhausted from great conversations Venue: NUS Plug in @BLK71 Drinks and Catering provided by:  Symphony Creative Solutions is a tech startup based out of BLK 71 and Its main shareholder is NYK line, which is one of the biggest shipping companies in the world. Leveraging their parent companies' business expertise and global network, their mission is to change the future of shipping and logistics industry by taking advantage of emerging technologies. They are looking forward to working closely together with other tech startups around the region. Sponsors make this growing movement possible - email us to chat!   Volunteers:  Our awesome Tech Socials are volunteer run, and need people like you! Let us know if you'd like to join the Singapore team! HackerNest is an international nonprofit uniting local tech communities through unpretentious Tech Socials and hackathons. We cram lots of smart, accomplished people into a room with free drinks. Our relaxed, down-to-earth events attract a diverse and highly technical membership. Strict no-douchebag policy.
events.location: NUS Plug-In@Blk71 (the NEW Co-Working Space), 71 Ayer Rajah Crescent, #02-01, 139951, Singapore, Singapore
